definition: serving to permit or facilitate further work or activity, a mine or quarry that is being or has been worked
details:
adjective
- serving to permit or facilitate further work or activity
= example: serving to permit or facilitate further work or activity
- adequate for practical use
- actively engaged in paid work
= synonyms: on the job
- performing or capable of performing
= example: performing or capable of performing
= synonyms: running
- adopted as a temporary basis for further work
noun
- a mine or quarry that is being or has been worked
= synonyms: workings
